content: 148, 149, 150-aam masumoor
148-aam masumoor
/Turangiyavare! Ningall unarnnezhunnettu sthuthippin / aakaashatthil ninnu kartthaavine sthuthippin / unnathangallil avane sthuthippin.
/tavante sakala doothanmaare! Avane sthuthippin / avante sakala sainyangallume! Avane sthuthippin.

/taadithyachandranmaare! Avane sthuthippin / prakaashamulllla sakala nakshathrangallume! Avane sthuthippin / aakaashangallude aakaashavum aakaashangallkku meetheyulllla vellllangallume! Avane sthuthippin / ava kartthaavine sthuthikkatte.
/tentennaal avan paranyu / ava undaayi. Avan kalppichu / ava srshdikkappettu. Avan avaye ennekkumaayi sthhirappedutthi / avan oru niyamam nishchayichu. Athu azhiyunnathumalla.

/tbhoomiyilninnu mahaasarppangallum / ellaa aazhangallum / agniyum, kalmazhayum / himavum, uracha vellllavum / avante vachanaprakaaram pravartthikkunna kaattukallum kodungkaattukallume / kartthaavine sthuthippin.
/tparvvathangallum sakala kunnukallum / phalavrkshangallum sakala kaarakilukallum / mrgangallum sakala kannukaalikallum / izhajantukkallum pakshikallum paravakallume kartthaavine sthuthippin.

/tbhoomiyile raajaakkanmaarum / sakala janangallum bhoomiyile prabhukkanmaarum sakala nyaayaadhipanmaarum / shishukkallum kanyakamaarum vrddhanmaarum yuvaakkallum / kartthaavinte naamatthe sthuthikkatte.

/tentennaal avante naamam maathram valiyathaakunnu / avante mahathvam bhoomiyilum aakaashatthilum undu / avan thante janatthinte kompum / thante sakala neethimaanmaarkkum! Thinte svantam janamaaya israayel makkallkkum mahathvavum uyartthunnu.
149-aam masumoor

/Tkartthaavinu oru puthiya paattum / neethimaanmaarude sabhayil avante sthuthiyum paaduvin / israyel thante srashdaavil santoshikkukayum / sehiyonte puthranmaar thangallude raajaavil aanandikkukayum cheyyatte.

/tavar thappukallaalum chathuratthappukallaalum avante naamatthe sthuthikkukayum / veenakallaal avanu paadukayum cheyyatte / entennaal kartthaavu thante janatthil ishdappedunnu / avan daridrarkku raksha kodukkukayum cheyyunnu.
/tneethimaanmaar bahumaanatthil balappedum / avar thangallude kattilukallilmel avane sthuthikkukayum / thangallude kandhangallkondu daivatthe pukazhtthukayum cheyyum.

/tpurajaathikallkku prathikriyayum / janangallkku shaasanayum koduppaanum / avarude raajaakkanmaare aalaatthukallkondum / avarude maanyanmaare irumpuchangalakallkondu bandhippaanum / ezhuthappettirikkunna nyaayavidhi avarudemel nadatthuvaanum / avante sakala neethimaanmaarkkum mahathvam undaakuvaanum / avarude kaikallil irumunavaall und.
150-aam masumoor
/Tkartthaavine avante shuddhasthhalatthu sthuthippin / avante shakthiyude aakaashatthattil avane sthuthippin.
/tavante vallabhathvatthil avane sthuthippin / avante shreshdhathayude bahuthvatthil avane sthuthippin / kompinte shabdatthaal avane sthuthippin / thamburukallaalum veenakallaalum avane sthuthippin.

/tthappukallaalum chathuratthappukallaalum avane sthuthippin / maadhuryamulllla kampikallaal avane sthuthippin / naadamulllla kaitthaallangallaal avane sthuthippin / shabdatthaalum aarppuvilliyaalum avane sthuthippin / ellaashvaasavum kartthaavine sthuthikkatte.

/tsakala jaathikallume! Kartthaavine sthuthippin / sakala janangallume! Avane sthuthippin / entennaal avante krpa nammudemel balappettirikkunnu / avan sathyamaayittu ennekkum kartthaavaakunnu / daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
